#include<stdio.h>

int main() {
	int t;
	scanf("%d\n", &t);

	while(t-- > 0) {
		int i, n;
		double area = 0.0;
		scanf("%d\n", &n);
		int x[n], y[n];
		for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			scanf("%d", &x[i]);
		}
		for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			scanf("%d", &y[i]);
		}

		for(i = 1; i < n-1; i++) {
			int x1 = x[i] - x[0];
			int y1 = y[i] - y[0];
			int x2 = x[i+1] - x[0];
			int y2 = y[i+1] - y[0];

			area += (x1 * y2 - x2 * y1);
		}
		area /= 2;
		if (area < 0.0) {
			area *= -1;
		}
		printf("%.1lf\n", area);

	}
	return 0;
}
